Coral Reefs bụ akwụkwọ sayensị a na-enyocha kwa nkeji iri na ise nke a raara nye ọmụmụ nke coral reefs

E guzobere ya n'afọ 1982 ma Springer Science + Business Media bipụtara ya n'aha International Society for Reef Studies, nke ọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị. Akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka International Coral Reef Society. Onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Morgan Pratchett (Mahadum James Cook)

Ha ebipụtala ọtụtụ isiokwu miri emi na-ekpuchi isiokwu coral reef dị ka nchekwa nke azụ coral reif na ụzọ dị iche iche nke na-ejide mgbagwoju anya nke coral refs mgbe ha na-enyocha ihe ndị na-emepụta okpokoro. Dị ka Journal Citation Reports si kwuo, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere mmetụta nke afọ 2017 nke 3.095. Dị ka Springer si kwuo, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere mmetụta mmetụta nke afọ 2020 nke 3.902, mmetụta mmetụta nke 3.880, na ka ọ na-erule afọ 2021 nwere nbudata narị anọ na iri ise na anọ, narị asaa na iri anọ
Mpịakọta iri anọ na otu, mbipụta nke abuo, Eprel 2022 nwere isiokwu 20 na-ekpuchi isiokwu dịgasị iche iche ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere ike ịnweta na-enweghị akaụntụ mgbe ha ka nwere ọtụtụ ozi zuru ezu

Mbipụta a na-ekpuchi isiokwu gụnyere ọmụmụ nke coral na Oké Osimiri Uhie na ọnụ ụzọ okpomọkụ ya nke enwere ike nyochaa iji tụọ anya nsonaazụ ọjọọ nke mgbanwe ihu igwe. Isiokwu ọzọ n'ime mbipụta a gụnyere nyocha nke coral reefs dị mgbagwoju anya na otu nke a si emetụta kpakpando mmiri corallivorous na Maldives. Okwu a nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ ndị ọzọ niile na-egosi ọkwa omimi na nghọta nke isiokwu ndị a na-atụle.
